lore: From the very beginning, Spacecats adapted quickly and carved out an important place in society in record time.\n\nThe "Peculiar Spacecat" is what the people of Siralim have named this creature due to the striking green hue of its fur. Centuries ago, they were slaves on their home planet, altered with a gene that made them glow in the dark, turning them into easy prey for predators to prevent their escape. Today, they no longer possess this trait.
menagerieDialog: (It's curled up in a floating ball, purring contentedly.)
Time to show these earthlings what a real predator looks like!
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Want to hear about them?
My space suit is impenetrable! Your puny weapons are no match for me!
(It's zooming around in erratic patterns, defying gravity.)
name: Peculiar Spacecat
